mapper.select: select c.companyName,o.* from offer o,company c where o.companyId=c.id and o.userId=#{userId} and o.offerStatus=2 and offerAction=1 order by o.offerSendTime desc

select a.articleTitle,a.id,a.articleTime,a.usersId,u.userName from article a,user u where a.usersId=u.id and a.articleStatus=2 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(WEEK,articleTime,now()) <=2 and a.usersId in (select byFollowId from follow where followId=#{userId})
select count(*) from article a,user u,follow f where f.followId=#{userId} and u.id=a.usersId and u.id=f.byFollowId order by a.articleTime desc

select a.articleTitle,a.id artid,c.usersId cid,u.userName from article a,user u,commentarticle c where c.usersId=u.id and c.articleId=a.id and commentArticleStatus=2 and a.usersId=#{userId} order by c.commentArticleTime desc
